MAIN_MESSAGE: There is power cut in the G67 and ML6 areas of Cumbernauld and Airdrie. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 9:52am. Our control centre will attempt to reset the network remotely to restore power in stages, and our engineers have arrived in the local area to investigate the fault on our overhead electricity network in the Cameronburn area. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by midday. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10:03am on Sunday, 28 March 2021
